member.name: M:BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.AccController.Deposit(BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.Account,System.Double)
member.summary: Make a deposit of a determined amount into an existing account
member.param: The account being deposited to
The amount to be deposited
member.returns: A boolean vlaue corresponding to whether or not the deposit was made
member.exception: Thrown if no account has been selected

member.name: M:BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.AccController.Withdraw(BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.Account,System.Double)
member.summary: Make a withdrawal of a determined amount from an existing account
member.param: the account being withdrawn from
The amount to be withdrawn
member.returns: A boolean vlaue corresponding to whether or not the deposit was made
member.exception: Thrown if no account has been selected

member.name: M:BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.AccController.Transfer(BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.Account,BIT706_A3_OliverBerry.Account,System.Double)
member.summary: Make a transfer between two exisitng accounts
member.param: The account that the amount is being deposited to
The account that the amount is being withdrawn from
The amount being exchanged
member.returns: A Boolean value corresponding to whether or not the transfer was made
member.exception: Thrown if the transfer results in a failed withdrawal
